A run for adventure becomes a brush with danger when best friends Tyler and Katie
team up with two special ponies! When Tyler&#039;s mother refuses to allow her and
Katie to ride the wonderful creatures, the two decide to go ahead anyways.

When they are kidnapped by two criminals(played by Joe Piscopo) wanted by the FBI,
their adventure takes a turn for the worse, but Two Bits and Pepper won&#039;t let
anything happen to their friends and soon the two ponies are hot on their tails!

Enjoy the movie!
